                  float finalX,
                  float finalY,
                  float power)

        Parameters:
        lineX - The x1 position from the previous line drawn
        lineY - The y1 position from the previous line drawn
        finalX - The x2 position from the previous line drawn
        finalY - The y2 position from the previous line drawn
        power - The power of the shot
